lines.text: And when I took his gun, that cops face looked like a blow fish caught in a net!
What's the matter? Want some more?
[the soldier grabs Rayna]
Where's Yahagi hiding?
How the fuck should I know? If you want him so bad, find him your own fucking self!
[Rayna spits on him, the soldier throws her]
You've got a big mouth, bitch!
[Rayna whips him the middle finger]

[Rakko drives up on his bike]
Yo! Late again, Rakko?
Shut up! I had to get rope!
Rope?
True! Mr. Brewski kept escaping so I had to tie him up.
Just tell me you got me beer.
Yeah, yeah. I got your beer. Right here!
[Rakko tosses the beer can to Dump]
Don't forget my girls. Keep em' coming.
Yeah, sure! Heads up!
[Rakko tosses three beer cans]
Hm-mm.
Let's make a toast.
A toast? To what?
Who cares? As long as we have something to toast with!
Then, chug it!
Chug it!
[they all open their beer cans and it spurts all over]
Rakko! I'll kick your sorry ass!

[calling back to them]
I told you that's why I was late, bitch!
Eve? Is something wrong?
Please come over here and have a seat, okay? Talk with me.
I *did* come to you! And all of us, risked our lives! And I didn't come all this way just to watch you put on a show!
Do not be upset. But we need to talk.
Then start talking, okay? Stop beating around the bush and be straight with me! Is this all some kind of test? But what would you be testing me for? I don't have anything to hide.
Why didn't you join the army?
I-I don't like the way they do things.
What don't you like?
Let's start with the whole Might Makes Right mindset. And Con forced Conformity. And how if your against them you're trashed. And how everything is handled with procedure instead of thought.
